item.description:
This month's meeting is entitled "ask the expert, it might be you". Participants are encouraged to bring their toughest PHP question or topic for the group's consideration. Some ideas might be:

Security best practices (should be able to cover that in 5 minutes ;-);
OO in PHP4 vs. PHP5;
Proper file structures (where should those crucial includes go);
.... you get the picture.

As always, after any healthy technical discussion food & drink must follow.

NOTE: we're going to start at 6:30 to give folks more time to get from work into Boston.

Here are directions:

http://www.bu.edu/it/...

The only change to the directions that is worth noting is that instead
of going to the Front Office everyone should take the stair well down
to the computer lab. To the right after entering the lab are two
doors. The second door on the right is LCR (Left Conference Room).

For more information, see www.BostonPHP.org
item.name: Boston PHP Meetup August Meetup
